CustomField.formula: IF( AND(ia_crm__Renew__c, ia_crm__Renewal_Template2__r.ia_crm__Internal_Email_Alert__c, ia_crm__Renewal_Template2__r.ia_crm__Create_Opportunity_from_Salesforce__c ) , If( ISPICKVAL( ia_crm__Renewal_Template2__r.ia_crm__When_Internal_Alert__c , 'Before'), ia_crm__End_Date__c-Today() - if(ISBLANK(ia_crm__Renewal_Template2__r.ia_crm__Number_of_days_for_Internal_Alert__c),0,ia_crm__Renewal_Template2__r.ia_crm__Number_of_days_for_Internal_Alert__c) , ia_crm__End_Date__c-Today() + if(ISBLANK(ia_crm__Renewal_Template2__r.ia_crm__Number_of_days_for_Internal_Alert__c),0,ia_crm__Renewal_Template2__r.ia_crm__Number_of_days_for_Internal_Alert__c) ), null)
CustomField.label: Days Until Renewal Owner Notification
